in a 35-32 win at Detroit, Michael Vick made the most of his first pro start since 2006. He completed 21-of-34 passes for 284 yards and two touchdowns and rushed for 37 yards on seven carries. I'm here to announce that Michael Vick will be the starting quarterback for the Philadelphia Eagles. I think his performance has exceeded expectations the past several weeks, said Eagles head coach Andy Reid at an evening press conference. ''This is not about the health or the performance of Kevin Kolb ... this is more about Michael Vick and his accelerated play.'' NFL investigating

the first time as a Piston, Allen Iverson scored 17 points and led Detroit to a 107-97 victory over the slumping Milwaukee Bucks. ''With everything going on, I wanted to play well,'' Allen Iverson said. I just wanted to play well. Especially for my teammates because I let them down by not being here. Allen Iverson was benched by Pistons coach Andrew Bogut Curry to begin the game, punishment for missing a mandatory team practice on Thanksgiving. thought my heart was going to jump out of my chest,'' said Allen Iverson , who in 31 minutes also handed out five assists and collected four rebounds. Philadelphia lost three of four games with Allen Iverson sidelined. Having Allen Iverson back helps. He's a finisher. He can get to the line and get the ball to guy at the right time. We've missed that, Elton Brand said. the quarterback shouldn't qualify as a dog owner. But Best Friends also has conceded that Michael Vick has put a brighter spotlight on the problem of dogfighting and the rehabilitation of pit bulls than they ever imagined possible. I'd have to say that he brought attention to the issue in a rather unfortunate way, said Best Friends co-founder Francis Battista. ''It's like people dying in a burning building.
